TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pens extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Pens for all the standard colors. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> objects returned by this class are immutable, meaning their properties cannot be changed. To see the colors represented by pens in this class, see [Colors by Name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332).
## Examples The following method demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Pens> class. This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. Paste the code into a form and call the `UsePensClass` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Docs.summary: A system-defined object with a width of 1.
Docs.value: A object set to a system-defined color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To see the color represented by this pen and other pens in this class, see [Colors by Name](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=92332).
